html: Defines the structure of content on a web page
css: Styles the appearance of HTML elements on a page
sass: CSS extension that adds variables and nesting
tailwind: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development
typescript: JavaScript with static types to catch errors early
react: JavaScript library for building user interfaces
vite: Fast build tool and dev server for web apps
git: System to track changes in code over time
github: Website for hosting and sharing Git repositories
figma: Web-based tool for designing and prototyping interfaces
